alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 12:48PM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected tonight, and then again late Monday and Monday night. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches in persistent snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Lake effect snow will produce snow covered roads and poor visibility at times tonight through Monday night. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
